Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/103rd
ShortDescription: Northbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Cottage Grove, 95th and Stony Island: due to, police activity near Stony Island/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Cottage Grove, 95th and Stony Island: due to, police activity near Stony Island/103rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
